text: Hi Mark, I hope you're doing well. I've been thinking about Emily and wanted to check in on how she's doing. If there's anything I can do to support, please let me know.
Mark, I saw the news about the fundraiser for mental health awareness. It's a great cause, and I'm proud of what you're doing.
Just checking in, Mark. I know things have been tough. Remember, I'm here if you need to talk.
